Localisation.Text: They make their living by risking their lives in ancient tombs or forgotten ruins. Treasure is their goal.
An alchemist is obsessed with mixing chemicals and seeing what happens. Usually with explosive results.
A knight clad in tough armour and sporting a powerful resolve. A dangerous foe to anything that would disturb the peace.
A simple peasant on an adventure. Are they a lost prince? The chosen one? Destined for greatness? Only one way to find out!
A powerful wizard, an expert at lobbing around spells.
